AccumulatedBalance.description: Represents and tracks the aggregated amount remained or owed in certain account which is owned by certain customer for a set of buckets.

href.description: A resource URI pointing to the resource in the OB that stores the detailed information.

id.description: Unique Identifier within the server for the recharge operation request

bucket.description: A reference to the buckets involved in the aggregation

items.description: A reference to the logical resources that can be used to identify the bucket balance for example where product ids are not unique.

description.description: Text describing the contents of the aggregated balance

name.description: Friendly name to identify the aggregated balance

partyAccount.description: A reference to the account that owns the buckets aggregated

product.description: A reference to the product whose consumption is managed by the bucket . This is an array to allow scenarios where a buckets are shared between different products

relatedParty.description: Used to provide information about any other entity with relation to the balance, for instance to define customer hierarchy for the balance (e.g.: customerId, userId, )

totalBalance.description: Aggregated for a set of prepay balance buckets associated to the product
